about_the_game:
Futanari Quest is a hot hentai RPG with yuri themes. Take the role of Yui, a young woman who is blessed/cursed with a brand-spanking-new dick! Yui is given the challenging task of ensuring her genetics are passed down to future generations.

Alongside your bubbly fairy companion, Clit, you'll meet plenty of charming characters along the way: strong warrior women, shy princesses, cold-hearted killers and more.

Features:
  • High-quality artwork, with a complete set of character portraits and full CGs
  • Full English voice acting
  • Battle monster girls, or converse with them to earn their trust
  • Lots of areas to explore
  • 10 fully voiced CG encounters, complete with artwork variations
  • 35 gallery images to unlock

Futanari Quest features 4 - 5 hours of gameplay, with plenty of replayability. Challenge yourself to unlock all the scenes in the gallery or charm all of the monster girls!

content_descriptors.notes: This game features sexual encounters between consenting adults. All characters depicted are 18 years or older. Sexual themes include futanari and yuri.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
